document_data.caption: A [[keffiyeh]], held in place by an [[agal]], sitting atop an [[aba]].
document_data.name: ''Aba''
document_data.mainbody:
An '''''aba''''' ({{Pronounce|AH|bah|refs=}}) was a sleeveless, light fabric robe or cloak worn by men and women to protect against the elements, common to peoples from desert climes, such as [[Calishite]]s,
{{TOC limit|3}}
document_data.Variants: A heavier, more expensive type of ''aba'', called a ''[[jellaba]]'' was worn in winter or at night.
